value:
I don't know where she gets it, but
my sister is too energetic for her
own good...$k$pTake your eyes off her for a moment,
and she's gone. Her guardians do not
have it easy.

One should think beyond their own
country. Frelia must keep an eye on
events in Carcino, for example.

Future kings must mind both their
words and their deeds. This is a fact
I strive to remember.

It is somewhat strange to be away
from the royal court. Though I feel
no sense of liberation.

Tana is nowhere to be seen... I tell
her to remain at my side when away,
and this is what she does.

A gift, delivered in friendship
from $Nf.
Right. I expect nothing less of myself.

It is no simple task to keep one's
goals in sight in combat, but I will
prove I am up to the task!

Calm down, Innes. You must not
lose your composure over such
trivial matters!

As the heir of Frelia, I must be skilled
in all manner of things.

I am Innes, first son of the king of
Frelia, King Hayden. Now, please,
tell me your name and title.

*sigh* Being a prince is exhausting.
I am expected to behave as the
future king at all times, you see.$k$pSome time ago, I tried to speak with
the prince of Renais about diplomacy,
but...it did not go well.$k$pIt was as though matters of the court
meant nothing to him.$k$pInstead it was the princess, hiding
behind her brother, who seemed to
have a mind for such things.$k$pShe said her name was Eirika,
as I recall...$k$pShe was intelligent—and rather
beautiful as well. I do wish my
sister could learn from her...$k$pD-don't laugh! How rude. I'm simply
paying the princess a compliment.
I don't mean anything beyond that!
ていっ
射抜く！
うわあっ
何だと…！？
Know your place!
Is that all you can do?
You'll regret that.
Fool.
How can this be?
ふっ…
I am Prince Innes of Frelia. I will rule the kingdom one day.
Insolent fool! Do you think you can just—
A king must not show any weakness. To be a ruler is to be without flaw.
I am proficient enough with the blade and the spear; however, it is the bow that is, to me, most natural.
My little sister, Tana, is something of a tomboy. I hope she can grow to be more dignified.
Ephraim of Renais... Anyone but him. I must best him!
You show quite a bit of promise! In the future, you would excel in my service.
Ah, yes.
Are you certain?
My arrow will pierce the heart!
